title: Supply, Demand, and Market Structures
description: A comprehensive exploration of how supply and demand interact to determine prices in different market structures, and how understanding these economic principles helps make better personal financial decisions.
learning_objectives: Analyze how supply and demand interact to determine equilibrium prices and quantities
Evaluate how different market structures affect consumer choices and pricing
Calculate consumer and producer surplus in various market scenarios
Compare how competition levels impact prices, quality, and consumer welfare
Apply supply and demand principles to make informed financial decisions as a consumer

skill_builder.title: Market Dynamics Simulator
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students manipulate supply and demand curves to see how market changes affect prices, observe equilibrium shifts, and analyze how different market structures impact consumer outcomes.
